title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider & Cradle Of Life Soundtracks & Scores
description:
This torrent contains four records, the soundtracks and scores of the two movies Lara Croft: Tomb Raider and Lara Croft: Tomb Raider - The Cradle Of Life.

One record in each .rar-file (opens with WinZip, WinRar and others).


Coding: mp3 192kbps

I have put a lot of effort into this torrent. Please enjoy!

2. Deep - Nine Inch Nails
3. Galaxy Bounce - The Chemical Brothers
